Plot Outline:

John Melendez (shock jock Howard Stern&#039;s "Stuttering John," The Tonight Show with Jay Leno), produced, wrote and stars in this modern day romance between a guy, his girl and the girl he&#039;d like to have join them in bed. This ultimate male fantasy becomes a cautionary tale of just how much can go wrong when dreams come true. Directed by Michael DeLorenzo (New York Undercover) and co-starring Bellamy Young (Dirty Sexy Money), Hudson Leick (CSI and Xena: Warrior Princess), and comic Jeffrey Ross, with memorable appearances by Mark Cuban (Dancing with the Stars) and JM J. Bullock                                                 (Kissing Jessica Stein).
